review: Great concept of exploration, building, crafting, and combat. If you have played terraria and enjoyed it, this would be a great game or you. If not i still highly reccomend purchasing this great game.
My feet tickle immensely while playing this game. I reccommend purchasing the Official soundtrack DLC, it has lots of great tunes to keep you chugging along the field!
